xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="demo_monster_click" id="pDP?M^:!IVK`~ephMEd(" x="112" y="88">
    <field name="name_">demoMonster01</field>
    <statement name="do_">
      <block type="radio_channel_set" id="V#=UOkS8t/Tvz_.+@6w|">
        <field name="var_">webduinoBroadcastor</field>
        <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">發送廣播訊息後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
        <value name="name_">
          <block type="text" id="B?%]R(yifCaXAw(2)*js">
            <field name="TEXT">aaa</field>
          </block>
        </value>
        <value name="msg_">
          <block type="text" id="Bw2PD*o23VCSf-C^Mi7p">
            <field name="TEXT">hello</field>
          </block>
        </value>
        <next>
          <block type="demo_monster_talk" id="KLLy~x[zY6|U-6}yyCZ|">
            <field name="name_">demoMonster01</field>
            <value name="val_">
              <block type="text" id="f%6@zvFp?Y:7XL-i%gEk">
                <field name="TEXT">發送廣播囉～</field>
              </block>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="delay" id="R~@IEAb~xW]^b^Cn!d07">
                <value name="secs_">
                  <block type="math_number" id="W_F/.SL]bvAO^TBU;Fhl">
                    <field name="NUM">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <next>
                  <block type="demo_monster_dont_talk" id="%.Ylt[ct*kqe}R?w(kyN">
                    <field name="name_">demoMonster01</field>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="radio_channel_get" id="AB4J5517~;iO/bS.xk,f" x="112" y="288">
    <field name="var_">webduinoBroadcastor</field>
    <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">獨立使用，不需放在迴圈積木內，就能持續偵測頻道。</comment>
    <value name="name_">
      <block type="text" id="_Xlvy}.Z5hr4u#X8Je-N">
        <field name="TEXT">aaa</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <statement name="do_">
      <block type="demo_monster_talk" id="x!ar|-voILOg}naddoz_">
        <field name="name_">demoMonster02</field>
        <value name="val_">
          <block type="radio_channel_value" id="lCSNrsjF|pDJI/!5M%fV"></block>
        </value>
        <next>
          <block type="delay" id="pYd{%9F13;psG(U[5_mY">
            <value name="secs_">
              <block type="math_number" id="/5mUdxbKRnK1J[:!Mghz">
                <field name="NUM">1</field>
              </block>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="demo_monster_dont_talk" id="KCZHAZCFp6_98^5vyT6N">
                <field name="name_">demoMonster02</field>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
